name: Micro's Escape
description:
Micro's Escape is a futuristic infinite runner game created by me as my first ever game for my college project made in UE4 so don't expect anything too in depth.

In the game you play as Micro, a AI Robot living in a futuristic timeline where Robots are banned from entering public areas due to a public fear of Robots taking over humanity. After years of working in a dimly lit factory (similar to a prison cell) you lose your patience- breaking down the factory wall with your own 'hands' to escape from your past suffering. 

Now that you are free you must run from the police who have placed barriers around the city to stop you in your tracks. How far can you go without falling for these traps?

Reccomended hardware: 

Windows: 

Nvidia GTX 1050ti or above 

Mac:

Base Apple M1 or above.
